metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15121 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A non-privileged user is able to mount a fuse filesystem on RHEL 6 or 7 and crash a system if an application punches a hole in a file that does not end aligned to a page boundary.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-lowlatency - 4.2.0-16.19

linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-smp - 4.2.0-16.19

No subscription required
